website_summaries.verdict: This product allows you to safely listen to music in the shower without sacrificing the quality of the showerhead itself.
pros: Wireless speaker can be used both in and out of the shower
cons: Volume can't be adjusted on the speaker
it can only be adjusted on the device you're streaming from

customer_reviews.title: Good but not without flaws
customer_reviews.text: Few quick things. Great Showerhead, I pulled the water restrictor out to get super flow. Battery life on the speaker is awesome. It pops in and out easy and is super easy to charge and pop back in. Easy to connect to my phone. The 2 problems I have are it doesn't get super loud and I have multiple shower heads so it gets drown out sometimes. Also it does this thing where it isn't playing certain instruments and sounds from certain bands and songs. Like it's pulling solely from a left or right and missing the other. Otherwise a pretty great product. I'll be excited for a beefed up version.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Taraszka

customer_reviews.title: We have had this shower head for just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this shower head for just a little over 2 months. However it hasn't even been installed for a full 2 months and out of no where it just stopped working. It turned it self off and on twice today and then it wouldn't turn back on at all. I tried to plug it in to see if it possibly needed to be charged however that did nothing. No red light no blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold up. Lasted about three years, then the joint that allows you to point the shower head in different directions wore out and the thing just falls down. Had to use a shampoo bottle on a rack for a while to prop it up until we had time to replace. My parents said Koehler is great, they’ll replace it, but there is only a one year warranty on this product, I guess because of the electronics- but we haven’t had any problems with those components. I’ll be wary of Koehler’s quality for the price in the future.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Shower head great; Speaker not so much
customer_reviews.text: Love the shower head!! The speaker isn't loud enough to hear over the water running. If you want a nice shower head I recommend. If you want to listen to music in the shower I'd buy a different speaker
customer_reviews.author: D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: The sound of disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Chuck has several of these and he loves them for his B & Bs. I ordered one; it’s a beautiful and creative product. Unfortunately the one that was shipped did not charge. I remember attempting to use Chuck’s but it was not charged. There are shower heads now that are charged by water flow. Having to remove these to charge is a small pain. I bought a waterworks hawk and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, decent audio quality, and more bass than expected.
customer_reviews.text: More bass then I expected, but sound quality could be improved. Good for what it is used for and MUCH better than others BT shower speakers I've had! And pairs extremely easily and the build quality it very impressive. Definitely reccomend if you are looking for a good quality speaker to listen to music in the shower. Another down side is this speaker does not do call audio, if that's functionality you need, this is not the speaker for you. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: DRush

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth issues
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great and the look and feel is also nice, the sound is OK (under the right expectations), battery charge lasts quite a lot. The 2 large disappointments are: a) if you use multiple devices that connect to it the Bluetooth is a nightmare (unlike the Bluetooth of other speakers that connects automatically). b) after a year or so of use, now it started to build mold, not in the speaker but in the shower head (between the area with the holes and the outer part). BTW there is not mold in any other area of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: ICV

customer_reviews.title: The shower-head is great, and does provide full coverage even with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product for a little over a year, and I still use it every day. The shower-head is great, and does provide full coverage even with the speaker located in the middle. My only problems with this have lied within the speaker itself. A few people have mentioned that the speaker isn't very loud and I have to agree with that.
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday. He loves it! I was a little worried that the speaker wouldn't be loud enough because I had read other reviews complaining that it was hard to hear. But our speaker is plenty loud and works great.
customer_reviews.author: br23

customer_reviews.title: ... a few weeks ago and I have had a great time using it
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Moxie a few weeks ago and I have had a great time using it. The sound is much better than I thought and no Bluetooth connection issues. I stream Amazon Music and no issues at all. The battery life is great and charges quickly. Just as important, the spray pattern of the shower head is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Kohler has a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter and she really loves it, using it pretty much every day. The speaker battery seems to stay charged a long time, and the sound quality of the speaker is actually pretty good. When I am in the adjoining bathroom, I often hear her singing along with her music when she's taking a shower. As for the shower head itself, it looks great and has an excellent flow pattern. I am probably prejudiced, but I find most Kohler products to be good looking and well made and think this looks pretty classy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasoturner

customer_reviews.title: Mornings are better
customer_reviews.text: Came across after staying at a D.C. hotel and decided it was an immediate must have. Rather than straining to hear morning news from my iPad, I can relax and listen in comfort. And because I can hear more clearly, I can also do the Running Man on beat while in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: G. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower head with good spray
customer_reviews.text: Nice shower head with good spray. Make sure you fully charge the speaker before trying to connect the Bluetooth. I thought the speaker didn’t work but I had to charge it a minimum of 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all. Good idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to be good. It has a good concept but the execution is bad. For a hundred dollars what you get is a 20 dollar shower head and a 10 dollar speaker. We already switched back to using the cheap waterproof speaker. The sound quality is horrible on this thing. Having quite buyers remorse right now.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Dean

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I can go back!! I love it, easy install, make sure ur volume on the device u connect it to is at max if it’s not loud enough for you. Battery life is excellent, I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Gëñë¤å£ F£ëx Žôñë ^_^/)

customer_reviews.title: it's very good. When we use the music
customer_reviews.text: We've had this 4 or 5 months at this point and we use it occasionally. Fundamentally, a showerhead, it's very good. When we use the music, it connects quick, sounds good and is loud enough. Great product and completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Delude

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, it was a huuuuge hit. Recently the battery dies really quick and the speaker is getting wonky (sounds like water may be getting in) so we will probably need to replace BUT it was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.author: S. Crosara

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work!
customer_reviews.text: I purchases one of these so excited to finally have a bluetooth speaker I didn't have to worry about finding room for in the bathroom. I unboxed it, charged the moxie and nothing. No blue light to speak of...only solid red. So, I contacted amazon and the sent me a replacement. Unboxed the Kohler Moxie and again charged the Moxie and nothing! I hate to say I am returning both of these for a refund. I read the directions and went online to trouble shoot. So bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Zeiger

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant on the quality of the shower itself and if the speaker was going to perform, and this absolutely works. Not the best sound quality in the world, but is pretty decent and the volume is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Dominguez Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. The music is more than loud enough, even when competing with running water and the bathroom fan. I just sync the shower head with my phone and then tune in to my favorite station on pandora. The water pressure is also quite good. The only complaint I have is that the shower head is quite short. I switched from a removable shower head and the moxie is only about 2 inches above face level (I am 6' 1"). Other than that I am a exteemy satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: DJ7

customer_reviews.title: Kids don't fight showers
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my two boys (11,13) for Christmas. Quick, easy installation. They love it and it's much easier to get them to take showers. The sound is really solid for what it is and it lasts a long time between chargings. Only issue is with using multiple devices - it can only connect to one device at a time, so we have to go find the last device connected and disconnect before connecting a new one. Otherwise, it's great and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Works well until turn off water supply
customer_reviews.text: While a good idea and the product works well, it is very dangerous if you turn off the water supply to the room/house and turn back on. Fortunately I was not in the shower when I turned it on as it blew the center speaker out of the shower head and would have caused serious injury. The exterior part of the shower head where the water comes through was damaged extensively and is not usable. No other shower heads in my home did this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new showerhead and my husband really wanted this one so I agreed once the price dropped below $100. It was super easy to install. Sound is clear as long as your music files are clear. Some songs are louder than others but that is not the speaker's fault, it's the music files on our phones.
customer_reviews.author: OSUNat

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out various instruments and vocals from songs
customer_reviews.text: This speaker fails to play songs with all of their recorded parts such as vocals and certain instruments. I first thought it had something to do with my phone but I tested my computer and different music apps and got the same result. Would not recommend this speaker
customer_reviews.author: Christopher William Petrides

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift but receipient seems to like it
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Muller

customer_reviews.title: The musical shower head with plenty of Moxie
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Installation was easy except it required way more thread tape than it should have to stop the slow drip at the threads. The volume is loud enough unless you have a fan right in the shower area. The charge has lasted for a couple weeks so far so battery life hasn't been an issue. Now my son wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: purchased this speaker for my daughter who is in college, she is absolutely ecstatic about the way it works. All her friends to come over want to take a shower in her bathroom because they get to listen to music. Since we have bought this, she uses it all around a small apartment in her daily life and gets so much use from it. she has had Bluetooth speakers in the past but the bathroom and the humidity from showers was always an issue.this speaker works great is easy to use and operates flawlessly, I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for music in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine 8 months ago and so far its great!! It was an easy install, its incredibly Loud, I do not use it in the highest volume level, The battery so far gives me around 10 days of usage, (around 3 showers per day). The Shower head does the Job, its elegant, truly happy with my investment!!! I bought now one for the guest bathroom and its a pleaser!! Hope a new version comes out with mic, love to pick up some calls and just get it done while showering! Ramon
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Rojas

customer_reviews.title: The shower that rocks!
customer_reviews.text: For those lovers of singing in the shower or those that simply need a groove when showering... Moxie is a load of fun in a tremendous product, even loud enough to enjoy without hearing aids, a necessity when under the water spray!
customer_reviews.author: Ghanima

customer_reviews.title: If you sing in the shower, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this for a present. Let me state that there are many shower speakers available, but none like this one. First, it's a high-quality shower head, and second a great Bluetooth speaker. Just plain fun. Great for an unusual gift. Takes a long time to charge ithe battery the first time, but you don't have to do it often. We have several friends and family who have one as a result of our recommendation, and they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Comido

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Edit not work I was and am not able to East all it very Bhatt product Definitely would not recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: franklin

customer_reviews.title: Speaker too quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Xmas present for my husband. Although the product was beautiful and the concept was great, the speaker was really quiet. We tried it with the water running, and you could barely hear it. We ended up returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Cool concept. I use this everyday. Only downfall is that it could go just a little louder and that it only plays in MONO, not stereo. This can be noticed when hearing tracks geared towards multi channel speaker systems. Otherwise, it gets the job done and may cause you to be late for work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Great job, Kohler!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but we love this product. The design, quality and sound are exceptional. The only suggestion for an improvement is to have volume control on the speaker (it is driven by the device). Love it and am thinking about getting a second one. I also like that you can buy a replacement and extra speakers. I like that colors have been added too! The price is also quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Power User

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I love taking a shower while listening to music and this makes it possible. I couldn't be more thrilled with how it's functions. The only thing I'd like it to not do is automatically re-pair with the last device. It's sometimes inconvenient to track down someone's phone to re-pair with yours. Installation was easy, the battery lasts a long time, and the shower itself is great. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miles

customer_reviews.title: Water presure very soft
customer_reviews.text: Sound of speaker is average not so bad, the look of the shower is very nice but the water pressure is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: sound , not so good , sorry but songs ok but spoken word not so much or not at all
customer_reviews.author: jsh

customer_reviews.title: If you love listening to music while in the shower
customer_reviews.text: If you love listening to music while in the shower, look no further. I can't shower without music now. Installation was extremely easy if you know how to change a showerhead. The speaker fits inside the head with a magnet and can easily be removed but is very secure. I take it out and play it in the kitchen while I cook. For how perfect this product is, I would pay double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick May

customer_reviews.title: Best waste of money ever.
customer_reviews.text: This was the best money I ever wasted on something absolutely unnecessary, and completely frivolous. It is a freaking speaker for you shower, completely ridiculous, and also completely awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Foley

customer_reviews.title: Great spray pressure & sounds very good too
customer_reviews.text: Great spray pressure & sounds very good too. Unless I'm doing something wrong, it seems to only connect to one Bluetooth at a time though. I would rate 4.5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Easy DIY Install
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an easy way to play music while in the shower, this is your answer. Sure there are other bluetooth speaks available but this adds a classic touch without the clutter. It is beyond easy to use and install on your own as long as you have plumber's tape. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for a gift for a music lover!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this showerhead as a unique gift for the hard to buy for kind of person and she loves it! Shower spray is very relaxing, music sound quality is just fine. I don't understand why some have said the volume level is too low for what they'd like, ours blasts the sound! It is a well designed and attractive unit, what more would we want?
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Said that it works great. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our son and he lives it. Said that it works great. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great in the shower. Has a lasting battery life. I wish I could change the volume on this device without having to get out and adjust it on my phone. But I love it nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: FelicityJane

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great! Shower head is great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February 2017. It's everything i ever wanted! We have used it a week straight 3 times a night during our showers and have yet had to charge this. Quality is great! Shower head is great. I recommend this showerhead %100 if your looking for an awesome shower radio experience
customer_reviews.author: Tanya unsderfer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you like music in the shower. The quality of the sound is great, and the battery lasts all week (7-hour battery life). A little clumsy if you take out to use as a speaker elsewhere... but in the shower where it is intended - fantastic! The actual shower head is good too. Fine product here.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: compromised sound quality in a cool package
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool product but kind of a compromise. The quality of the showerhead is good but not great, and the bluetooth speaker sound quality is just OK. It's tinny and lacks any kind of bass. But the design is undeniably cool and overall the product works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Andy K

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: Works great It likes to pair with only one device though, so if you have two people sharing it has trouble switching between Bluetooth sources
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower head with a speaker as a gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it. It was very simple to install and it is working great. Sound is very clear and loud enough to hear it even outside of our bathroom during a shower. I don't have any negative comments. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Salcutan

customer_reviews.title: Dancing in the shower!
customer_reviews.text: Having the music right in the shower head enhances the total showering experience. I only wish there was an app for the Moxie that would allow me to turn it on and off from my phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband - he loves it!! It's a great addition to a shower for the music-loving morning person, who is tech-savvy enough to know how to easily work bluetooth and has their playlist on a compatible device.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, my kids love this device
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, my kids love this device. Great for music lovers who like to shower when listening to their music.
customer_reviews.author: BulldogXTRM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, wish it could be synched to more than one device
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, really pleased with the shower head as well. My only issue is that you can only have one device synched to it at a time so if my husband uses it in the morning and leaves without disconnecting it from his Bluetooth, I can't use it which is a huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: peeksgirl

customer_reviews.title: Most of those parts came out which makes the water pressure greater than what the magnet can hold and you would think its so eas
customer_reviews.text: Came apart. Suddenly while taking a shower, the magnet held speaker just feel out of its place. When you remove the speaker, there is this white large elastic thing that the water comes out of. It is held by tiny "male" "dots" that click into tiny "female" holes that are in he shower itself. Most of those parts came out which makes the water pressure greater than what the magnet can hold and you would think its so easy to "click" them back into place but NO. I tried for about 2 weeks. I couldn't click more than 10 of the.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mattar

customer_reviews.title: music in shower
customer_reviews.text: like it alot now don't have to carry speark into bathroom
customer_reviews.author: G. BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sounds good. Wife loves it. Was great gift! Very easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head! I only gave it four stars because although it may not be possible..I would love if it had a volume control on speaker itself. Otherwise, it is amazingly awesome! I have played music from my ipod and my cell phone and it's crystal clear! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel R.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and good flow volume
customer_reviews.text: Usually products like these screw up one function or do both half-a$$ed. Not this one. Good sound quality. Good water flow volume. The syncing can sometime be a little jeeky, which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: daveNYC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for mothers' day and it is one of my favorite things. It was simple for my husband to install and makes the small amount of time in the shower (away from my 18 month old twin sons and 5 year old daughter) like a small vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good sound. Not as loud as I thought or seen on YouTube videos but could be the was my bathroom is. Came in pretty good time. Seller responded fast to inquiry I had.
customer_reviews.author: Liz_215

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast and as described. Sound quality is good and seems to hold a charge well. Tried listening to speach and not loud enough, but for music it is good
customer_reviews.author: Scando

customer_reviews.title: I put this in our cabin and I love it! The sound is pretty good considering how ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in our cabin and I love it! The sound is pretty good considering how small it is and it connects easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Never shower without it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it- great sound quality, easy connection and decent battery life. It also comes with a small stand so it’s great for using around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my kids' showers. They love them. I hear them come on every morning while they get ready for school. The sound quality is great and the water pressure is not bad either.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Damaged - Waiting for Replacement Update: 5 STARS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for replacement as the first head came damaged! Update: We received the replacement 2 months ago and we LOVE this head!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Look

customer_reviews.title: has connectivity problems/glitches
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first month or so, but never got that loud. After the first month it stopped allowing me to connect because the device kept saying that it was paired with something else (it has only been paired with my phone and no other Bluetooth connectors exist in my house). Not sure if it was just a defect in product or not, but other than that I had no problems and the battery life was great
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and is easy to install and pair with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend. I was kind of scared to buy it because of the reviews stating it was not loud enough, but he loves it. He does not complain about the volume. It's just what you need for a nice shower. I also get to enjoy the gift. ;-) Also it so easy to use. Anybody can use it. I truly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very loud at all. Bought a portable ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get very loud at all. Bought a portable water safe speaker that's 3 times the sound and half the size of this speaker. This one is not worth it
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, but over-priced
customer_reviews.text: The built-in speaker is a good idea, but the sound quality is just poor. After using is several times, I switched back to my bose minilink which sounds way better even outside the bath. Another thing is that the showerhead did not meet my expectation for the water pressure improvement. Water still comes out soft, and unfortunately the water pattern is not adjustable. After all, this showerhead is okay, but I think it is over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Siyuan

customer_reviews.title: Coolest ever
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This thing is completely awesome. I bought it for my 28yr. old and now I want one too. Well made and great sound - let alone a good strong spray from the showerhead as well.
customer_reviews.author: Howlin’Usual

customer_reviews.title: the speaker stoped working
customer_reviews.text: then shower head is great but the speaker stoped working. it will not hold a charge
customer_reviews.author: Joel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker and shower head. Be careful not to chip finish off when installing. Also be mindful it doesn't include the elbow pipe that actually comes out of the wall. This is just the shower head and speaker. The battery for the speaker lasts dozens of uses so far.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying.
customer_reviews.text: It starts skipping really badly every time the water is on. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, only drawback is that the batter drains pretty quickly and you have to hold down the button for a while before it turns on. Otherwise it is great and loud with bass.
customer_reviews.author: ankusho300

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! Works great! Very nice aesthetically. Only had to charge once so far in over a month!
customer_reviews.author: Med Assoc

customer_reviews.title: Now that's Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Must say I was wondering what I would find when I opened and installed the head. Everything was there, charged the head while I removed and installed the new shower head. Was easy zip zip and shower works better than before. Paired it to my Samsung 2 with no problem, started my Rhapsody app and music flowed with the water. Sound was clear but a little low. Turned up the volume on the phone and the music got nice and loud. After testing it out I tried parring it to my wife's Samsung 3. It parred up just fine, must say very happy with this purchase. Amazon you amaze.
customer_reviews.author: Alienwolf

customer_reviews.title: Sound is "fine" but not great once it works
customer_reviews.text: Always a PITA to pair with my iPhone. Sound is "fine" but not great once it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J

customer_reviews.title: This product is not good
customer_reviews.text: The speaker does not work. I need to know how to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Cool Idea, but Poorly Executed Design and Capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Batteries die way too fast and very very limited range.
customer_reviews.author: OregonGal74

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower head, however, I have noticed that my showers have gotten longer. Would highly suggest. I also like the look of the shower head without the speaker in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tx_guy05

customer_reviews.title: Love this and doesn't affect the spray
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. Easy to install and pair with my phone. Battery seems to last awhile. Charge it every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Du5t1n

customer_reviews.title: A reason to get out of bed in the morning
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! Just link with your phone through Bluetooth then hop in the shower. The volume is fantastic out of the speaker and the showerhead itself is just as good, and no issues with water pressure. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shower head ever and plays music, only thing that sucks is the shower is always occupied
customer_reviews.author: Mathew S.

customer_reviews.title: What I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, works great, and sounds great. The only thing that would make this better is if it also could control the music and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Burchett

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these for 2-3 years now. Use almost everyday. Never had any issues. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nugs

customer_reviews.title: Speaker works great, Shower Head leaks
customer_reviews.text: worked great until the past month and continually leaks around the white seal. Unfortunately, there is no way to return and get a replacement through Amazon. I would not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Has Great Sound with the right bluetooth device
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday and sometimes twice a day.. Has Great Sound with the right bluetooth device.. Battery last about 1 1/2 to 2 weeks depending on shower length.. Would recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Worth it but not a must-have
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower head, speaker is great. Only downside is that you can't adjust the volume. I don't think you can even adjust it from your phone. Maybe that'll be the new feature for the second generation in order to sell more.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H Hinrichs

customer_reviews.title: not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: wish the volume was a bit louder and the water pressure was higher but its pretty cool regardless
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son-in law for Christmas. He couldn't wait to get home and take a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Patti McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Good idea terrible execution
customer_reviews.text: The ball joint that the shower head uses to swivel was LOOSE. It would not stay in any position and hung if the speaker was in the shower head. The speaker will make you shower head hang down due to the weight. Good idea terrible execution! Will be returning this shower head today!
customer_reviews.author: G. Latson

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great flow. Perhaps a bit pricey (?), but I have no regrets buying it. Just make sure than anyone else (in range) who syncs to it disconnects after his/her shower or you won't be able to. This thing rocks! Literally.
customer_reviews.author: M. Demyanovich

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears!  Get it?  AHAHAHA
customer_reviews.text: It's like a concert in my bathroom all the time. Everyone wants to shower in our shower.
customer_reviews.author: LWhitneyL

customer_reviews.title: beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks exactly how you would expect from a Kohler product: beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Bagehi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had troubles with mine after approximately a year of use but Kohler warranty service quickly replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Rykhlov

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my music loving hubs. It has been a gift for the whole family. The sound is fantastic and the water flow is quite good. I plan on purchasing more for the other bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcintosh-sonnier

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! I use it practically every time I shower
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I use it practically every time I shower! Battery life is good, sound quality is surprising for being as small as it is.
customer_reviews.author: StevDowner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for singing in the shower...
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is just right for listening to music, podcasts or watching you're favorite show on your streaming service of choice... if you have glass showers. Wait for it to be on sale and it definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Diaz

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this. she use to take her cell to the shower and was horrible de distortion that we could hear from outside. now we don't even hear the music and she enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: fernando j. zambrana

product_meta.title: KOHLER 9245-G-BN Moxie Showerhead, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description: Style:1.75 GPM| Color:Brushed NickelShowering has never been so fun. Moxie lets you stream your favorite music, news, or talk radio right in the shower with you. The moxie showerhead holds a portable speaker that pairs wirelessly with devices enabled with Bluetooth) technology to deliver high-quality audio to your shower. The speaker docks directly into the showerhead, so your music is closer than ever when showering. While it plays your favorite sounds, this revolutionary showerhead generates a full-coverage, revitalizing spray of water for a sensory experience like no other. Moxie is easy to install and use; the wireless speaker pops out for recharging, then securely pops back in for use while showering. You can even take it with you as a wireless speaker to use in any room of the house, or on the go.
feature_bullets: Showerhead with wireless speaker streams your personalized music playlists, news, and other audio in the shower
Syncs with devices enabled with Bluetooth wireless technology including smartphones, Mp3 players, tablets, and laptops located up to 32 feet away
Total harmonic distortion: 1.5 watts at 1 kHz with < 1% distortion
Water-resistant wireless speaker pops in and out of showerhead for easy recharging
Wireless speaker can be used outside the shower space, independent of the showerhead, to stream music in any room

Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery provides approximately 7 hours of run time (ACTUAL battery life will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions rechargeable batteries have a limited Number of charge cycles)
60 angled nozzles deliver a full-coverage, enveloping spray
Soft silicone sprayface is easy to clean

specifications.Included Components: Wireless speaker, Micro-usb charging cord, Showerhead
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars389 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
